checkConsumption() - Method in class mode.AbstractMode
checkConsumption() is used to check consumption if the current consumption is higher than the upper consumption, if higher, then close the device in a priority queue which user inputs.

checkState(String) - Method in class db.ConnectionDB

checkTemperature(int) - Method in class mode.AbstractMode
checkTemperature(int) is used to check temperature if the current temperature is higher than the upper temperature, if higher, then close device 1 which is identified the heater.
